name: ▯▯▯
description:
If you want to pronounce the title I suggest 'boxboxbox'.

This is a game about running around on a bunch of boxes which are crumbling under your feet. You are collecting a bunch of arbitrary cuboidal orbs to increase your arbitrary score - the highest I've ever gotten was 24!

Keyboard Controls:
WASD - move around
Mouse - look around
SPACE - jump

Gamepad Controls:
Left Stick - move around
Right Stick - look around
A (or eqivalent) - jump

Don't jump all the time! Jumping will cause more boxes to fall (roughly a 3x3 area under your feet)

I know for a 7dfps/procjam game there's not a lot of first person shooting or procedural content in here. As for 7dfps I don't mind, because I do think I capture the general movement feel of a fast paced old school fps (even though it doesn't have view bobbing ;) ), which to me is more important than the shooting.
As for procjam: I want to generate more interesting levels, and all of the ground work is in there, so maybe look out for a future update!

If the unicode game name causes problems on your system, I'm sorry, please tell me and I'll upload a different build.
